description: After the success with the Crusader Kings III: Chapter III season pass, Paradox have decided to give the same treatment to Stellaris with Stellaris: Season 08. We also have a new trailer and release date for Stellaris: The Machine Age.
title: Paradox announce Stellaris: Season 08, with Stellaris: The Machine Age launching May 7th

description: I know plenty of people who will probably be quite interested in the Devious Deckbuilders Humble Bundle, which includes some pretty great games.
title: Get your Deckbuilder fix in this latest Humble Bundle

description: Bazzite is one of the most interesting versions of Linux available for handheld gaming devices, and the latest release version 2.5.0 is out now with some great improvements.
title: Bazzite v2.5 has fixes for Lenovo Legion Go and ASUS ROG Ally, plus smoother installs

description: Twenty years after the first release, OpenTTD 14.0 has been made available bringing with it some really useful sounding features to enable new ways to play.
title: OpenTTD 14.0 brings a scalable font, a new ship pathfinder, social platform integration

description: An essential tool for anyone wanting to configure their fancy Razer devices is OpenRazer, with version 3.8.0 just released bringing expanded support on Linux.
title: OpenRazer v3.8 adds support for 6 more Razer devices on Linux

description: Inspired by the core gameplay of Minecraft, the name MineClone2 was not a particularly good one and it seems the developers were aware and so it's gone through a rebrand to be now called VoxeLibre.
title: MineClone2, inspired by Minecraft, gets renamed to VoxeLibre

description: GE-Proton 9-3 has been released, and it includes a fancy new option to hopefully prevent you having issues with modded games when moving between systems like a PC and a Steam Deck.
title: GE-Proton 9-3 and 9-4 released with a new option to help with modded games

description: GE-Proton 9-3 has been released, and it includes a fancy new option to hopefully prevent you having issues with modded games when moving between systems like a PC and a Steam Deck.
title: GE-Proton 9-3 released with a new option to help with modded games

description: Eyebrow Interactive have given a fresh coat of paint to their 2012 game Closure, thanks to bringing in game porter Ethan Lee to get some technical issues sorted out.
title: Clever light-manipulating puzzler Closure from 2012 gets upgraded for modern PCs
